titles.title: To require the Secretary of the Interior to establish a pilot program for commercial recreation concessions on certain land managed by the Bureau of Land Management.
RPPA Commercial Recreation Concessions Pilot Program Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
